original: Hetuṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum sekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum asekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paccayā na na hetu na nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
